amendment.description: An amendment numbered 239 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to increase funding for endometriosis research at the National Institute of Child Health and Human Development to $26 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 239 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to increase funding for endometriosis research at the National Institute of Child Health and Human Development to $26 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Finkenauer amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A012) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Finkenauer amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Finkenauer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Finkenauer amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
